profile.name: Ali Rajab
profile.headline: Software Engineer II | Product Manager | Mobile Application Developer | Flutter | Java | Web Developer | Laravel | React.js | Vue.js | Junior Blockchain Developer | Solidity | Python
profile.summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 4+ years of professional experience in software industry, I have a proven track record in software development across various domains, including Delivery, Travel and Information Management Systems. I excel at leading teams, developing cost-efficient solutions, and enhancing productivity through effective project management and clear communication. My technical expertise spans mobile application development, web development, and server management, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality, scalable systems. I am passionate about working on projects that have a significant impact and benefit millions of users. My collaborative approach, combined with my technical skills, allows me to create solutions that improve user experience and operational efficiency.

My technical expertise spans mobile application development, web development, and server management, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality, scalable systems. I am passionate about working on projects that have a significant impact and benefit millions of users. My collaborative approach, combined with my technical skills, allows me to create solutions that improve user experience and operational efficiency.

My technical expertise spans mobile application development, web development, and database management, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality, scalable systems.

I am passionate about working on projects that have a significant impact and benefit millions of users.

My collaborative approach, combined with my technical skills, allows me to create solutions that improve user experience and operational efficiency.

Key Skills:
Project Management: Agile methodologies, ClickUp, Jira
Mobile Development: Flutter, Dart, Java, UI/UX design, REST API integration, Firebase
Web Development: C#, .Net core, PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, Node.js, Vue.js, HTML/CSS, AWS
Database Management: SQL Server, MySQL, SQLite, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

Fluent in both Arabic and English, I am committed to continuous learning and professional growth.

For more about my work and to connect, visit my Linktree.

experience.description:
• Led and mentored cross-functional teams (mobile, frontend, backend) in delivering features across 3 mobile apps and 1 website, resulting in a 75% increase in productivity and 50% growth in user base.

• Orchestrated efficient project management using ClickUp and streamlined Git repository management for multiple codebases, improving team collaboration and reducing feature delivery time by 80%.

• Transformed stakeholder requirements into technical specifications, prioritizing high-impact features that reduced customer (Merchant, Client, Delivery Man) support calls by 90%.

• Optimized system architecture by refactoring 10+ critical APIs decreasing server load by 80%.

• Established cost-effective solutions, including OTP implementation, generating $1000 monthly savings while maintaining robust security standards.

- Tech: ClickUp, Flutter, Laravel, Linux, Github, JMeter, GetX, Google Maps, Firebase.

• Increased data accessibility by 80% and reduced server latency by 50% through backend and cloud optimizations.

• Processed and optimized over 10,000 rows of flight, airport, and airline data, improving app response times by 90%.

• Drove a 35% increase in app user base by implementing social sign-in options (Google, Apple, Facebook).

• Managed the app's life cycle from development to launch on the App Store and Google Play , ensuring a seamless user journey.

• Tech: Flutter, BloC, Clean Architecture, AWS, JavaScript, XCode, HIVE

• Designed 5+ UML and ERD diagrams, reducing system architecture complexity by 30%.

• Decreased development time by 50% through efficient backend and frontend implementation in a 2-person team.

• Integrated FCM, cutting follow-up calls by 40% and boosting customer satisfaction scores by 50%.

- Tech: Ionic Framework, Visual Paradigm, MySQL, Laravel, Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).

education.degree: MPhil, Software Engineering and Information Systems

projects.title: Flight Ticket Reservation System
projects.description:
- Built a dashboard for administrators to manage flights, reservations, users, and thier roles(+3).

- Enabled users to search among flights, make reservations, and manage their reservations.

- Utilized the Code-First approach to design and manage a database with 6+ tables in MSSQL.

- Implemented Razor page model for managing 15+ website pages and their associated logic.

- Added multilingual support for Arabic and English, catering to a diverse user base.

projects.title: Your Store
projects.description:
- Comprehensive Ecommerce Mobile App: Developed a feature-rich mobile application for ecommerce using Flutter.

- Product Search: Integrated a powerful search functionality, allowing users to easily find products.- Favorites Management: Enabled users to effortlessly manage their favorite items.

- Order and Cart Management: Provided seamless order processing and cart management capabilities.

- Bloc Design Pattern: Utilized the Bloc design pattern to ensure efficient and scalable management of the app's business logic.

certifications: Thanks letter from The General Electricity Company
